mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, URL, CREATEDATE, PUBLICS) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{url}, SYSDATE, #{publics})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW=#{pw}
SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT URL FROM MEMBER WHERE URL=#{url}
SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=#{nickName}
SELECT ID, PW FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROFILEIMG (FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORIGINALNAME) VALUES (PROFILEIMG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{originalName})
mapper.select: SELECT IGNORED FROM IGNORE WHERE IGNORING = #{nickName}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IGNORE WHERE IGNORING=#{ignoring} AND IGNORED=#{ignored}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IGNORE (IGNORENUM, IGNORING, IGNORED) VALUES (IGNORE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ignoring}, #{ignored})
INSERT INTO AGREE (ID, AGREE1, AGREE2) VALUES (#{id}, #{agree1}, #{agree2})
